Name: Member Card
Description: Adds a trapdoor to every shop that leads to a second shop with a unique stock and marked-up prices.

Name: Battery Pack
Description: Recharges Isaac's currently held active item and drops 2-4 batteries.

Name: Mom's Bracelet
Description: Lets Isaac pick up and throw rocks, TNT, poops, friendly Dips, Bombs, and other obstacles.

Name: The Scooper
Description: Summons a Peeper familiar for the current room, which leaves a trail of red creep.

Name: Ocular Rift
Description: Gives Isaac the chance to fire tears that create rifts where they land, which damage nearby enemies and pull in enemies, pickups, and tears/shots from all sources.

Name: Boiled Baby
Description: Gives Isaac a familiar that fires chaotic bursts of tears in all directions.

Name: Freezer Baby
Description: Spawns a shooting familiar that has a chance to petrify enemies, and Freezes monsters upon killing them.

Name: Eternal D6
Description: Rerolls all items in the room. Each item has a 30% chance to disappear instead.

Name: Bird Cage
Description: The first time Isaac takes damage in a room, a familiar leaps on an enemy, dealing damage and releasing a rock wave. For the rest of the room, it chases enemies similar to  Dead Bird.

Name: Larynx
Description: Isaac shouts, damaging and pushing away nearby enemies. The shout gets stronger the more charges the item has. Can also be charged by taking damage.

Name: Lost Soul
Description: Creates a ghostly familiar that closely follows behind Isaac. It dies in one hit, but respawns at the start of the next floor. Each time it survives until the next floor, it rewards Isaac with Soul Hearts, Eternal Hearts, or an item.

Name: Blood Bombs
Description: Grants a Red Heart container and restores 5 hearts. Bombs leave behind damaging red creep. Isaac can place bombs at the cost of half a heart if he doesn't have any.

Name: Lil Dumpy
Description: Gives Isaac a Dumpy familiar that pushes, confuses, or poisons nearby enemies and flies in a random direction after taking damage.

Name: Bird's Eye
Description: Gives a chance to shoot fires alongside tears that block enemy shots and deal damage to enemies that touch them.

Name: Lodestone
Description: Gives Isaac the chance to fire tears that magnetize enemies they hit, causing them to attract nearby pickups and enemies, as well as tears/shots from all sources.

Name: Rotten Tomato
Description: Adds a chance to fire tears that Mark enemies. Marked enemies are attacked by other enemies.

Name: Birthright
Description: Grants a character-specific effect that enhances their special abilities.

Name: Red Stew
Description: Refills all heart containers. Grants an enormous damage boost that wears off over time.

Name: Genesis
Description: Removes all of Isaac's items and pickups and takes him to a unique Bedroom with some pickups and Chests and a trapdoor to the next floor. For every item Isaac lost, he gets to take an item from a set of three.

Name: Sharp Key
Description: Adds 5 keys on pickup. Allows Isaac to throw his keys to deal damage to enemies, destroy obstacles, and open doors.

Name: Booster Pack
Description: Drops 5 random cards.

Name: Mega Mush
Description: Gigantifies Isaac for 30 seconds, increasing damage and range while lowering tears, granting invulnerability, and allowing Isaac to crush enemies and obstacles he walks on. The effect persists between rooms.

Name: Knife Piece 1
Description: Combined with  Knife Piece 2, creates a knife familiar that damages enemies and can open the door to the  Corpse.

Name: Knife Piece 2
Description: Combined with  Knife Piece 1, creates a knife familiar that damages enemies and can open the door to the  Corpse.

Name: Death Certificate
Description: Takes Isaac to an abandoned and expanded version of  Home, which has one copy of every item in the game. After taking an item, Isaac returns to the room he used Death Certificate in.

Name: Bot Fly
Description: Spawns an orbiting fly familiar that fires shielded tears at incoming enemy projectiles.

Name: Meat Cleaver
Description: Splits all enemies in the room into two smaller versions of themselves with much less health.

Name: Evil Charm
Description: Increases luck by 2.0. Provides immunity to burn, confusion, fear, and poison.

Name: Dogma
Description: Grants flight, +0.1 speed, +2 damage, and the  Holy Mantle effect. Grants enough health to have 6 full hearts, if possible. Automatically given to Isaac after defeating Dogma.

Name: Purgatory
Description: While in a room with enemies, spawns cracks on the ground. Walking over these cracks summons ghosts that launch themselves at enemies and explode.

Name: Stitches
Description: Passively spawns a familiar that moves in the direction Isaac shoots. On use, Isaac swaps places with the familiar.

Name: R Key
Description: Brings Isaac back to the first floor of a new run, retaining all of his items.

Name: Knockout Drops
Description: Adds a chance to shoot a fist tear that has extremely high knockback and confuses enemies.

Name: Eraser
Description: Throws an eraser that instantly kills the first monster it hits, and prevents that monster from spawning for the rest of the run. Can only be used once per floor.

Name: Yuck Heart
Description: Gives Isaac a Rotten Heart.

Name: Urn of Souls
Description: Spews a stream of damaging flame. Gains Soul Charges each time an enemy dies, which are used to fuel the urn.

Name: Akeldama
Description: While in an uncleared room, Isaac forms a trail of bloody tears that drags behind him, bursting and dealing damage upon contact with enemies.

Name: Magic Skin
Description: Consumes one heart container or two soul hearts to spawn an item and give Isaac a broken heart container that can never be filled. If Magic Skin isn't being held after being used, it is very likely to replace any future items.

Name: Revelation
Description: Grants flight and two soul hearts. In addition to tears, Isaac can charge up and fire a powerful holy laser.

Name: Consolation Prize
Description: Increases Isaac's lowest stat and drops either 3 coins, 1 bomb, or 1 key depending on what Isaac has the least of.

Name: Tinytoma
Description: Gives Isaac a Teratoma orbital that blocks shots, deals contact damage, and splits into smaller versions of itself upon taking damage. The smaller versions break into blue spiders.

Name: Brimstone Bombs
Description: Gives Isaac +5 bombs and causes his bombs to fire  Brimstone lasers in the cardinal directions upon exploding.

Name: 4.5 Volt
Subname: Beat the juice out of them!
Description: Active items don't charge when clearing rooms. Instead, they're charged by dealing damage to enemies.

Name: Fruity Plum
Description: Gives Isaac a miniature Baby Plum familiar that propels itself diagonally around the room, firing tears behind itself as it travels.

Name: Plum Flute
Description: Summons the boss Baby Plum to fight for Isaac in the current room.

Name: Star of Bethlehem
Description: Spawns a star familiar that slowly travels towards the Boss Room, giving an aura that increases damage and tears and grants homing tears.

Name: Cube Baby
Description: Spawns an ice cube familiar that slides around when walked into. It slows and deals contact damage, freezing monsters it kills.

Name: Vade Retro
Description: While held, enemies leave behind ghosts on death. Using the item causes the ghosts to explode, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Stronger enemies leave bigger ghosts.

Name: False PHD
Description: Converts good pills into bad pills and identifies all pills. Bad pills now have secondary positive effects. Grants one  Black Heart.

Name: Spin to Win
Description: When used, gives Isaac +0.5 speed and greatly increases the rotation speed of Isaac's orbitals for 3 seconds. Gives Isaac a spinning top orbital that blocks enemy shots and deals contact damage to enemies while held.

Name: Vasculitis
Description: Enemies explode into tears upon death, which inherit the effects of Isaac's tears.

Name: Giant Cell
Description: Causes Isaac to spawn micro-Isaacs when he takes damage, which chase and shoot at nearby enemies.

Name: Tropicamide
Description: +1.5 Range, Increases tear size.

Name: Card Reading
Description: Spawns two portals at the beginning of each floor that each lead to either the Boss Room, Secret Room, or Treasure Room.

Name: Quints
Description: The first five enemies killed in a room will spawn stationary shooting familiars where they died.

Name: Tooth and Nail
Description: Isaac periodically turns into a spiked statue, briefly becoming invulnerable and dealing contact damage.

Name: Binge Eater
Description: +1 Red Heart Container and fully heals Isaac. Item pedestals cycle between their initial item and one of several food items, and picking up food items grants a temporary damage boost and a permanent boost to 2 stats (different for each one) in addition to their normal effects. Food items will also heal 2 additional Red Hearts when picked up.

Name: Guppy's Eye
Description: Shows the contents of Chests, Fire Places, Sacks, and Shopkeepers before they're opened/destroyed.

Name: Strawman
Description: Spawns a controllable  Keeper to fight enemies alongside Isaac, functioning similarly to  Jacob and Esau. If Keeper dies, he spawns 5 blue spiders and Strawman is removed from Isaac's inventory.

Name: Dad's Note
Description: Sends Isaac on an Ascent toward  Home.

Name: Sausage
Description: Adds a Red Heart Container, fully heals Isaac, and gives +0.2 Speed, +0.5 Damage, +0.5 Tears, +1.5 Range, +0.2 Shot Speed, and +1.0 Luck. Increases the chance of encountering a  Devil Room,  Angel Room, and/or  Planetarium each by 6.9%.

Name: Options?
Description: If a room gives a reward when cleared, there will be two different rewards to chose from. Taking one causes the other to disappear.

Name: Candy Heart
Description: Gives Isaac a permanent stat boost whenever he heals with red heart pickups.

Name: A Pound of Flesh
Description: Devil deals now cost coins,  Shop items now cost health, and consumables in shops are free but surrounded by spikes.

Name: Redemption
Description: If Isaac enters a  Devil Room, but leaves without taking/opening anything in it (including  Black Hearts, etc.), he gets +1 Damage and a  Soul Heart at the start of the next floor.

Name: Spirit Shackles
Description: On death, Isaac's ghost is chained to his dead body and he can continue to fight with 1/2 of a heart, returning to life after 10 seconds. After it activates, it must be recharged by picking up a soul heart.

Name: Cracked Orb
Description: Unlocks doors and reveals a random room on the map when Isaac takes damage.

Name: Empty Heart
Description: If Isaac has one red heart or less at the beginning of a floor, he gains an empty red heart container.

Name: Astral Projection
Description: Causes Isaac to turn into a ghost if he gets hit while in an uncleared room, giving him flight and spectral tears and blocking the next hit he takes.

Name: C Section
Description: Replaces tears with fetuses that chase down enemies and deal contact damage. Each shot requires a brief charge up.

Name: Lil Abaddon
Description: Spawns a familiar that charges a miniature  Maw of the Void attack while Isaac shoots.

Name: Montezuma's Revenge
Description: While firing, Isaac charges up a short-ranged  Brimstone-like diarrhea beam that shoots behind him.

Name: Lil Portal
Description: A familiar that flies forward, consuming pickups in its path. Each one will increase its size and damage and spawn a Blue Fly. Every four pickups, it opens a portal that leads to an unexplored room.

Name: Worm Friend
Description: Gives Isaac a Nerve Ending familiar that burrows out of the ground to grab and deal damage to enemies over time.

Name: Bone Spurs
Description: Enemies spawn floating bones on death, which block shots and damage/repel enemies that touch them.

Name: Hungry Soul
Description: Enemies have a chance to spawn ghosts on death, which chase and deal contact damage to enemies and explode after a short time.

Name: Jar of Wisps
Description: Spawns random wisps that shoot various tears, block shots, and deal contact damage. The number of wisps spawned increases every time the jar is used.

Name: Soul Locket
Description: Gives Isaac a permanent stat boost whenever he picks up a soul heart.

Name: Friend Finder
Description: Spawns a random friendly monster that mimics Isaac's movements and attacks.

Name: Inner Child
Description: Upon death, Isaac respawns in the current room with half of a Red Heart, a massive size down, and +0.2 Speed.

Name: Glitched Crown
Description: Before being picked up, item pedestals cycle between 5 random items.

Name: Belly Jelly
Description: Causes enemies to bounce off of Isaac, dealing damage to them if they hit an enemy or obstacle. Also gives Isaac the chance to deflect enemy shots.

Name: Sacred Orb
Description: Prevents items of quality 0-1 from appearing, and items of quality 2 from appearing 33% of the time, greatly increasing the quality of items received from all item pools. Quest items are unaffected.

Name: Sanguine Bond
Description: Spawns a special set of spikes in the  Devil Room. Taking damage from the spikes has a chance to grant a reward.

Name: The Swarm
Description: Spawns eight orbital flies, which turn into Blue Flies after they block a shot. Each time a room is cleared, spawns another orbital fly.

Name: Heartbreak
Description: Grants 3 broken hearts and +0.25 damage for every broken heart Isaac has. Every otherwise fatal hit will add 2 more until Isaac has nothing but broken hearts.

Name: Bloody Gust
Description: The first 6 times Isaac takes damage on a given floor, he gains Speed and Tears for the rest of the floor, up to a maximum of +1.02 and +3.00, respectively.

Name: Salvation
Description: Gives Isaac a halo that summons beams of light on enemies inside it. The halo grows larger the more times Isaac has taken damage this floor.

Name: Vanishing Twin
Description: Spawns a familiar that becomes a clone of the floor's boss when entering the boss room. Defeating it drops an extra item.

Name: Twisted Pair
Description: Spawns two familiars that float on either side of Isaac and fire tears that use his tears, range, shot speed, and tear effects, and scale with damage.

Name: Azazel's Rage
Description: Isaac builds rage every time a room is cleared. After four rooms, fires a large  Brimstone laser when entering the next room.

Name: Echo Chamber
Subname: I can see see the future future future
Description: When Isaac uses a Card, Pill, or Rune, he also uses a copy of the previous three Cards/Pills/Runes he used after picking up Echo Chamber.

Name: Isaac's Tomb
Description: Spawns an Old Chest at the start of each floor.

Name: Vengeful Spirit
Description: After taking damage, spawns an orbital wisp that lasts for the entire floor, up to a maximum of six. They fire tears but do not block shots.

Name: Esau Jr.
Description: Swaps between the current character and Esau Jr., who has +2 flat damage and flight. Characters have independent items and health. Dying as either character ends the run.

Name: Berserk!
Description: Causes Isaac to go berserk for 5 seconds, greatly increasing his speed, tears, and damage, but restricting him to using a melee weapon instead of his tears. This item charges by dealing damage to enemies instead of clearing rooms.

Name: Dark Arts
Description: Briefly grants +1 speed and makes Isaac invulnerable and intangible. When the effect ends, destroys all projectiles and damages all enemies Isaac ran through.

Name: Abyss
Description: Destroys all items in the room and gives Isaac a unique locust familiar for each item destroyed. Some items generate locusts with special effects.

Name: Supper
Description: Grants one full Red Heart container. Heals 1 additional  Red Heart.

Name: Stapler
Description: +1 Damage. Prevents Isaac from firing tears from his left eye, like  Cain.

Name: Suplex!
Description: Isaac dashes forward and picks up the first enemy hit. After a moment, he slams them into the ground to deal damage and create a circular rock wave.

Name: Bag of Crafting
Description: Collects and holds up to 8 pickups, which can then be used to craft an item. The power level of the item is based on the quality of pickups used.

Name: Flip
Description: Item pedestals have a second uninteractable "ghostly" item behind them. Activating will flip the real and ghostly items around. If playing as  Tainted Lazarus, also flips between them and  Dead Tainted Lazarus.

Name: Lemegeton
Description: Spawns a wisp representing a random passive item, which orbits Isaac but can be destroyed. While the wisp is alive, Isaac gains that item's effects. Generation uses the current room's item pool 25% of the time, otherwise a random pool.

Name: Sumptorium
Description: Removes half a heart and creates a Clot familiar that mimics Isaac's movements and tear effects. As  Tainted Eve, passively converts health into Clots while firing. Activating returns all Clots to health.

Name: Recall
Description: Retrieves the Forgotten's body from any distance. Only available as the  Birthright effect for  Tainted Forgotten.

Name: Hold
Description: Exclusive to  Tainted ???. Allows him to save one poop bomb for later, allowing him to gather more over time.

Name: Keeper's Sack
Description: Gives range, speed, or damage when buying things from a shop. Also spawns three coins and a key on pickup.

Name: Keeper's Kin
Description: Rocks and props spawn blue spiders over time while in a room with enemies, and spawn two blue spiders when destroyed.

Name: Keeper's Box
Description: Spawns a random shop item or pickup which can be bought for its normal price.

Name: Everything Jar
Description: Spawns certain pickups based on how many charges it has. If fully charged, instead has one of many unique effects.

Name: TMTRAINER
Subname: ZZaZZ ZZdZZiZZmZZhZZ ZZvZZ ZZoZZ ZZ ZZsZZlZZhZZsZZoZZaZZiZZ
Description: Causes all future items to be "glitched", granting them completely random effects.

Name: Anima Sola
Description: Chains down the nearest enemy for 5 seconds, preventing them from acting.

Name: Spindown Dice
Description: Transforms all items in the room by decreasing their internal ID number.

Name: Hypercoagulation
Description: After Isaac takes damage from an enemy or donates health, launches red hearts from Isaac that despawn after 1.5 seconds.

Name: IBS
Description: Causes Isaac to throw poop, create buffing creep, or drop bombs while fighting enemies.

Name: Hemoptysis
Description: Double-tapping a fire button causes Isaac to sneeze blood, dealing damage to enemies in front of him.

Name: Ghost Bombs
Description: +5 bombs. Bombs become spectral and spawn ghosts that deal contact damage to enemies and explode after 10 seconds.

Name: Gello
Description: Spawns a demon familiar that's attached to Isaac and moves and fires in the direction Isaac shoots, using Isaac's damage, tears, range, shot speed, and special tear effects.

Name: Decap Attack
Description: Throws Isaac's head, which is still able to fire tears at the spot it lands. Reactivating the item or stepping on the head reattaches it.

Name: Glass Eye
Description: +0.75 damage, +1 luck.

Name: Stye
Description: Tears fired from the right eye have +28% damage, increased range, and decreased shot speed.

Name: Mom's Ring
Description: +1 damage. Drops a random rune or soul stone upon pickup.
